resources.string:
README for Project 6
Name: Pratik Kadam
Project 6 : An Android Airline Application
 This project will deploy my Airline application as an Android app
The Airline class extends AbstractAirline and the Flight class extends AbstractFlight 
Airline class - it has a name and consists of multiple flights
 Flight class - it consists of details like flightnumber, source, departure time, destination, arrival time
 PrettyPrinter class - it prints the list of flights in an airline in a pretty way
Enter name of airline to Delete
